item.title: 芯片集散地台湾 10 月起将再涨电价
item.description: 台湾是全球最大芯片制造商的所在地，将从 10 月中旬起再次上调电费，此举将对岛内工业用户造成影响。【原文：Taiwan, home to some of the world’s biggest chipmakers, will raise its electricity rates again from mid-October in a move that will impact the island’s industrial users.】

item.title: 诺和诺德本月表现不佳，拖累医疗保健股在连续数月上涨后下跌
item.description: 受诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）即将公布的第三季度财报以及阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）和罗氏公司（Roche Holding AG）更新试验性药物的影响，欧洲医疗保健类股将结束自2010年3月以来最长的连涨势头。【原文：European health-care stocks are set to snap their longest winning streak since March 2010, dragged down by concerns over Novo Nordisk A/S’s upcoming third-quarter results and experimental drug updates from AstraZeneca Plc and Roche Holding AG.】

item.title: 阿布扎比酒店集团餐饮部加入中东上市热潮
item.description: 阿布扎比国家酒店集团（Abu Dhabi National Hotels）计划将其餐饮部门上市，为中东地区日益增多的首次公开募股活动添砖加瓦。【原文：Abu Dhabi National Hotels plans to list its catering arm, adding to the growing number of initial public offerings in the Middle East.】

item.title: 阿波罗收购与 30 亿美元债务有关的德意志银行 SRT 大部分股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）购买了德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）与 30 亿美元杠杆融资债务组合相关的大部分重大风险转移。【原文：Apollo Global Management bought most of Deutsche Bank AG’s significant risk transfer linked to a portfolio of $3 billion in leveraged finance debt, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德要求给予 Grifols 更多的尽职调查时间
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）将要求更多时间对西班牙制药商 Grifols SA 进行尽职调查。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management is set to request more time to conduct due diligence on Spanish drugmaker Grifols SA, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世界银行向尼日利亚提供 15.7 亿美元贷款，用于医疗保健和气候保护
item.description: 世界银行批准通过三个项目向尼日利亚提供 15.7 亿美元的新贷款，这些项目旨在加强妇女和儿童的健康，以及改善大坝安全以提高对气候变化的适应能力。【原文：The World Bank approved $1.57 billion in new lending to Nigeria via three projects aimed at strengthening health for women and children, and improving dam safety to improve resilience to climate change.】

item.title: 意大利通胀率降至 1%以下，迫使欧洲央行加快减息步伐
item.description: 意大利通胀率降至 1%以下，这给欧洲中央银行加速降息带来了更大压力。【原文：Italian inflation sank below 1% — heaping more pressure on the European Central Bank to accelerate interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 泰国家庭债务略有缓解，贷款增长受限降温
item.description: 泰国家庭债务在第二季度略有下降，原因是银行收紧贷款以控制不良贷款，以及借款人在十年来最高的利率水平下加快了还债速度。【原文：Thailand’s household debt fell marginally in the second quarter as banks tightened lending to control bad loans and borrowers accelerated debt repayment amid the highest interest rate in a decade.】

item.title: 据说 Carote 香港首次公开募股吸引了 Hillhouse 和顺为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国厨具制造商卡洛特有限公司（Carote Ltd.）将成为美的集团（Midea Group Co. ）以 46 亿美元在香港上市后首家在香港上市的公司，该公司已吸引了包括 Hillhouse Investment 和顺为资本（Shunwei Capital）在内的投资者的兴趣。【原文：Chinese kitchenware maker Carote Ltd., which is set to be the first company to list in Hong Kong since Midea Group Co.’s $4.6 billion debut, has drawn interest from investors including Hillhouse Investment and Shunwei Capital, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本加密货币审查可能为降低税收和专用 ETF 打开大门
item.description: 日本将开始对本国的加密货币规则进行审查，从而为降低数字资产税收提供了可能性，并有可能为推出投资代币的国内基金铺平道路。【原文：Japan is set to begin a review of the nation’s cryptocurrency rules, opening up the possibility of lower taxes on digital assets and potentially paving the way for the roll out of domestic funds investing in tokens.】

item.title: 高盛称就业数据可能引发投资低盈利股票的热潮
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：A solid US jobs report at the end of the week could spur a rotation from the market’s most profitable names into stocks with weaker earnings, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 投资者在重组中撤出 GAM 的量化部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着瑞士资产管理公司 GAM Holding AG 对其投资业务进行重组，投资者已从该公司的量化交易部门撤资数亿美元。【原文：Investors have withdrawn hundreds of millions of dollars from a GAM Holding AG quantitative trading division as the Swiss asset manager restructures its investment operations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受国际货币基金组织（IMF）贷款和利率下调的推动，巴基斯坦经济增长 3.07
item.description: 由于国际货币基金组织提供的资金和较低的利率促进了经济活动，巴基斯坦上一季度的经济增长速度超过预期。【原文：Pakistan’s economy grew faster than expected last quarter as funds from the International Monetary Fund and lower interest rates buoyed activity.】

item.title: 财政前景改善，南非收益率降至 10%以下
item.description: 南非基准政府债券收益率自 2022 年 4 月以来首次跌破 10%，原因是全球风险反弹与国内财政稳定的迹象相吻合。【原文：Yields on South Africa’s benchmark government bonds dropped below 10% for the first time since April 2022, as a global risk-on rally coincides with signs of fiscal stability at home.】

item.title: 罗氏希望在研究改革中推出 20 种新药
item.description: 罗氏控股公司（Roche Holding AG）正致力于在本十年内推出 20 种新药，以治疗给社会带来最大负担的疾病，同时努力启动其开发计划。【原文：Roche Holding AG is aiming to deliver 20 new medicines to address diseases that rank among the biggest burdens to society this decade, as it seeks to kick-start its development program.】

item.title: 欧洲各国物价降温，德国各地区通胀放缓
item.description: 德国九月份六个州的通胀率都有所下降，这表明稍后公布的全国数据将放缓，这将进一步助长欧洲中央银行在十月份降息的呼声。【原文：Inflation sank across six German states in September — suggesting a slowdown in national data due later in the day that will further fuel calls the European Central Bank to cut interest rates in October.】

item.title: 日本央行举措加剧波动，瑞穗寻求内部 JGB 老将
item.description: 在日本央行寻求进一步提高利率之际，对有经验、能驾驭动荡市场的政府债券交易员的争夺日趋白热化，瑞穗证券公司（Mizuho Securities Co.【原文：Competition is heating up for government bond traders with experience who can navigate volatile markets as the Bank of Japan seeks to further raise interest rates, and Mizuho Securities Co. is looking internally for former dealers who can return to the trading floor.】

item.title: 推动核能复兴的三件大事
item.description:
为什么要重启三哩岛反应堆？【原文：

Why they're restarting a reactor at Three Mile Island.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：推动核能复兴的三件事（播客）
item.description: 本月早些时候，我们得到了一个令人吃惊的消息：位于三哩岛的已关闭核反应堆将重新启动。当然，三哩岛是 1979 年著名灾难的发生地，也是导致美国停止建造新核电站的原因之一。这座特殊的反应堆已于 2019 年关闭，因为其经济效益已不再有意义。那么，为什么要重启呢？为什么人们对核电的兴趣和热情普遍高于以往？【原文：Earlier this month, we got the surprising headline that the shuttered nuclear reactor at Three Mile Island will be restarted. Of course, Three Mile Island was the site of a famous disaster in 1979 — one of the incidents that contributed to the US pulling back on the construction of new nuclear plants. This particular reactor was shuttered in 2019, when the economics of it no longer made sense. So why the restart? And why is there generally more interest and excitement about nuclear than there ha】

item.title: 美国大选前夕，货币交易员远离美元
item.description: 对美元前景感到矛盾的投资者越来越倾向于避开这一世界储备货币的交易。【原文：Investors conflicted over the outlook for the US dollar are increasingly favoring trades that avoid the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: 美国和中国的市场提振举措尚未令经济学家信服
item.description: 全球最大的两个经济体采取了强于预期的刺激措施，使市场前景更加光明。对于经济学家来说，目前尚无定论。【原文：A stronger-than-expected pivot to stimulus in the world’s two biggest economies has brightened the market outlook. For economists, the jury is still out.】

item.title: 全球极端天气有可能增加食品支出
item.description: 从亚洲到美洲的干旱、暴雨和火灾加剧了人们对农作物收成的担忧，推高了主食的价格，最终可能导致食品价格上涨。【原文：Droughts, downpours and fires from Asia to the Americas are stoking worries about crop harvests, pushing up prices for food staples that could eventually flow through to higher grocery bills.】

item.title: 沙特外国直接投资困境为王储计划蒙上阴影
item.description: 今年上半年，沙特阿拉伯的外国直接投资流入量停滞不前，这表明沙特仍在努力吸纳现金，以支持其庞大的经济转型计划。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s inflows of foreign direct investment stagnated in the first half of the year, showing that the kingdom is still struggling to draw in cash to support its vast economic transformation plan.】

item.title: 印度石油产品出口在欧洲维修期间大幅增长
item.description: 由于欧洲炼油厂停产导致包括非洲国家在内的海外买家需求激增，印度的清洁石油产品出口跃升至2022年3月以来的最高点。【原文：Exports of clean oil-product exports from India jumped to their highest since March 2022 as refinery shutdowns in Europe led to a spike in demand from overseas buyers, including nations in Africa.】

item.title: 克罗地亚总理表示，升级后不急于出售外国债券
item.description: 克罗地亚总理安德烈-普兰科维奇（Andrej Plenkovic）表示，尽管最近信用评级有所改善，但克罗地亚没有计划加快在国际市场上出售债券。【原文：Croatia has no plans to accelerate its bond sales on international markets despite recent improvement in credit ratings, according to Prime Minister Andrej Plenkovic.】

item.title: 希腊将以高达 7.27 亿欧元的价格出售 NBG 10%的股份
item.description: 希腊正在出售希腊国家银行 10% 的股份，这是私有化行动的一部分，在过去的一年里，希腊从贷款机构中退出。【原文：Greece is selling a 10% stake in National Bank of Greece as a part of a privatization drive that has seen the state exiting from lenders in the past year.】

item.title: 施普林格-自然》杂志在德国的首次公开募股定价约为区间的中间值
item.description: 学术出版商施普林格-自然公司（Springer Nature）的首次公开募股定价将在目标区间的中段左右，这可能是德国今年第二大首次公开募股，为欧洲股票资本市场的反弹添砖加瓦。【原文：Academic publisher Springer Nature’s initial public offering is set to price at around the middle of its targeted range in what could be Germany’s second-biggest IPO this year, adding to the rebound in Europe’s equity capital markets.】

item.title: 中国政府警告英伟达，中国人工智能芯片龙头飙升 20% 上限
item.description: 中国人工智能芯片制造商汇川技术公司（Cambricon Technologies Corp.【原文：Chinese AI chipmaker Cambricon Technologies Corp. soared its 20% daily limit on Monday, leading a sector rally after Bloomberg News reported Beijing was stepping up pressure on domestic companies to ditch Nvidia Corp. processors for local alternatives.】

item.title: 应用营养公司宣布首次公开募股计划，助力伦敦发展
item.description: 应用营养有限公司（Applied Nutrition Ltd.）正在考虑在伦敦进行首次公开募股，这可能会对英国遭受重创的资本市场起到推动作用。【原文：Applied Nutrition Ltd. is considering an initial public offering in London, in what could be a boost for the UK’s bruised capital markets.】

item.title: 津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 在贬值后走弱
item.description: 津巴布韦黄金支持的货币在 9 月 27 日贬值 43% 后，周一开盘兑美元汇率略微走低。【原文：Zimbabwe’s gold-backed currency opened slightly weaker against the dollar on Monday after a 43% devaluation on Sept. 27.】
